recipeCards.description: Ever wondered what its like to taste chicken for the first time? Don't worry 'cause we have you covered! Satisfy your taste buds with some crispy-chicken-parmesan or try out our href="https://tasty.co/recipe/easy-sticky-chicken-drumsticks"> sticky-chicken-drumsticks . One bite and you'll remember exactly why you fell in love with chicken!
recipeCards.name: The Reason You Love Chicken

recipeCards.description: For meat lovers, breakfast is usually incomplete without some crispy bacon on the side with their morning eggs. The smoky flavor of the sliced meat along with its melting layers is a treat to dig into! Here's a guide to how you can create some amazing dishes using bacon. From cheesy-bacon-twists to href="https://tasty.co/recipe/bacon-wrapped-parmesan-garlic-knots"> bacon-wrapped-parmesan-garlic-knots , we can safely say, "Bacon makes everything better!"
recipeCards.name: Bacon Makes Everything Better!
